name: Magnetic Assassin
description:
A 2D Platformer made in Godot, inspired by games like Hollow Knight and Mario.

This is a relatively short game consisting of 6 levels, 2 main types of enemies, and hard platforming. This game was designed as a developing challenge as I have never made a 2D game and I wanted to make one in a single day. I feel really happy with this game I have managed to create within the timespan of a day and I hope you enjoy this game as much as I do.
